description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省常德市临澧县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Linli County, Changde City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, current County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省常德市的行政管理机关，是临澧县人民政府的业务上级机构。
description.en: The administrative organ of Changde City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China, and the functional superior of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 临澧县的国家权力机关，是临澧县人民政府的组织上级机构。
description.en: The organ of state power in Linli County, and the organizational superior of the Linli County People's Government.

nodes.id: 临澧县人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 临澧县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 临澧县人民代表大会的常设机关，是临澧县人民政府的组织上级机构。
description.en: The standing body of the Linli County People's Congress, and the organizational superior of the Linli County People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国共产党临澧县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党临澧县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在临澧县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Linli County.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长，后因腐败问题被判处死刑，缓期执行。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government, later sentenced to death with a reprieve for corruption.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省的纪律检查机关，曾查处李大伦、谭本仲等官员。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection agency of the Communist Party of China in Hunan Province, which investigated officials such as Li Dalun and Tan Benzhong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省长沙市的国家检察机关，曾对李大伦提起公诉。
description.en: The state procuratorial organ of Changsha City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China, which prosecuted Li Dalun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省长沙市的中级人民法院，曾一审判处李大伦死缓。
description.en: The intermediate people's court of Changsha City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China, which sentenced Li Dalun to death with a reprieve in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长，后因严重违纪违法被查处并判处无期徒刑。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government, later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law and sentenced to life imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省的国家监察机关，曾对谭本仲进行监察调查。
description.en: The state supervisory commission of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China, which conducted a supervisory investigation into Tan Benzhong.

description.zh-cn: 指开除中国共产党党籍、开除公职的纪律处分。
description.en: Refers to the disciplinary action of expulsion from the Communist Party of China and removal from public office.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家监察机关。
description.en: The highest state supervisory agency of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 临澧县人民政府是常德市人民政府的业务上级机构。
description.en: The Linli County People's Government is functionally subordinate to the Changde City People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 临澧县人民代表大会是临澧县人民政府的组织上级机构。
description.en: The Linli County People's Congress is the organizational superior of the Linli County People's Government.

relationships.target: 临澧县人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 临澧县人民代表大会常务委员会是临澧县人民政府的组织上级机构。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the Linli County People's Congress is the organizational superior of the Linli County People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党临澧县委员会

description.zh-cn: 在中国政治体制中，地方人民政府接受同级中国共产党委员会的领导。
description.en: In the Chinese political system, the local people's government is under the leadership of the Communist Party of China committee at the same level.

description.zh-cn: 胡彬彬自2022年3月起担任临澧县人民政府县长。
description.en: Hu Binbin has served as the County Mayor of the Linli County People's Government since March 2022.

relationships.source: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2006年5月，李大伦接受湖南省纪委查处。
description.en: In May 2006, Li Dalun was investigated by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 2007年1月26日，长沙市人民检察院就李大伦涉嫌受贿案向法院提起公诉。
description.en: On January 26, 2007, the Changsha Municipal People's Procuratorate filed a public prosecution against Li Dalun for suspected bribery.

description.zh-cn: 2008年11月20日，长沙市中级人民法院一审判处李大伦死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: On November 20, 2008, the Changsha Intermediate People's Court sentenced Li Dalun to death with a two-year reprieve in the first instance.

relationships.source: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2020年6月，谭本仲因涉嫌“严重违纪违法”接受湖南省纪委纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: In June 2020, Tan Benzhong was subjected to disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection for suspected 'serious violations of discipline and law'.

description.zh-cn: 2020年6月，谭本仲因涉嫌“严重违纪违法”接受湖南省监察委员会监察调查。
description.en: In June 2020, Tan Benzhong was subjected to supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Supervisory Commission for suspected 'serious violations of discipline and law'.

description.zh-cn: 2020年11月30日，谭本仲遭到开除党籍、开除公职（双开）处分。
description.en: On November 30, 2020, Tan Benzhong was subjected to the disciplinary action of 'double expulsion' (expulsion from the Party and removal from public office).

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年12月，中央纪委公开通报了谭本仲案，其最终被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: In December 2022, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection publicly reported on Tan Benzhong's case, who was ultimately sentenced to life imprisonment.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年12月，国家监委公开通报了谭本仲案，其最终被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: In December 2022, the National Supervisory Commission publicly reported on Tan Benzhong's case, who was ultimately sentenced to life imprisonment.
